answers.author: Karen Harrington
answers.text:
We are in the middle of a project to assess our customer feedback mechanisms at the City of Aspen.  As a part of that project, we developed a "maturity matrix" that asks questions regarding whether the departments have surveys, and assesses whether they are using best practices in their survey design, execution and use.  If you would like a copy of the matrix,  let me know your email address and I'll send a copy.

author: Kurt Lockhart
text:
The City of Charlottesville is seeking to create an inventory of all the surveys that departments send out to both internal and external stakeholders. The inventory will ask questions such as: What surveys does your department send? To whom? How frequently? What kinds of questions do you ask? How are the results used?
Has your municipality administered this kind of “survey of surveys”? If so, what suggestions or advice would you give?
Thanks in advance for your responses.
title: Inventory of Department Surveys
